2.title: Dave's BFF

episode of.title: The Life of Dave the Taxi Driver (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: As Dave waits around for taxi fares. Dave gets surprised by his child hood best friend that comes back into town but that's not the only surprise he gets.

imdb.plot outline: The Life of Dave the Taxi Driver is an animated series featuring Dave Majerski a dedicated and loyal taxi driver for the city of bloomsburg. The show is set in the Bloomsburg city where weird things keep happening, whether its being Accused of new crimes or avoiding Franks crazy idol Lord Kromdar. The show is based on the featured films by Chaz Dowdell "Clifford Rays: Dave the Taxi Driver" and "CR: The Life of Dave the Taxi Driver Fantastic Movie"
imdb.title: The Life of Dave the Taxi Driver
akas: The Life of Dave the Taxi Driver (United States)
plot: Dave Majerski is a fellow citizen in the glorious yet hectic city of bloomsburg. Dave will experience a journey of new friends, situations, and cultures in his life revolving around the city of bloomsburg.::Chaz Dowdell

_The Life of Dave the Taxi Driver_ (qv) is an animated series featuring Dave Majerski a dedicated and loyal taxi driver for the city of bloomsburg. The show is set in the Bloomsburg city where weird things keep happening, whether its being Accused of new crimes or avoiding Franks crazy idol Lord Kromdar. The show is based on the featured films by Chaz Dowdell "Clifford Rays: Dave the Taxi Driver" and "CR: _The Life of Dave the Taxi Driver_ (qv) Fantastic Movie"::Phillip Dowdell
